name: CaregiverCharacteristics
title: Caregiver Characteristics
description: This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing an observation of caregiver characteristics.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an defines the ability and willingness of the caregiver to assist and support the patient in following the plan of care and medication regimen..),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Caregiver Characteristics.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Caregiver Characteristics.)
